A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you are expecting more of the same Star wars you will not like this movie.  Last Jedi takes the star wars tropes and turns them on their head and gives fan not what they want\, but something that could turn out to be far more rewarding in the end.  If you are expecting fan service like TFA\, this is not it.  Go in with an open mind and you should be pleased.
